pullRequest.title: Update JPA Class Transform Bytecode Collector Trace Spec to 'JavaPers…
pullRequest.bodyText: The trace spec enabling the logging of class bytecode before and after enhancement, 'JPA.BytecodeCapture', undesirably triggers with the "JPA=all" trace spec.  Changing the trace  specification to 'JavaPersistenceClassTransformation' with this change, in order to enable it only when specifically intended.

nodes.bodyText:
Can we change this to
JPAConstants.JPABYTECODE_TRACE_GROUP = "JavaPersistenceByteCode";

commit.message:
Update JPA Class Transform Bytecode Collector Trace Spec to 'JavaPersistenceClassTransformation'

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

Apply code review comments for #10467.

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>
